'''Makani 'olu'olu''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Land of Tleyaoyotl]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 139]].

===Etymology===
* ''Makani 'olu'olu'' means "pleasant breeze" in Hawaiian.
